text: Ana mba nzambaren Zisas ga muuŋgim, Zisas ana ŋgarkarav kha bigen ana neŋgi, “Guma mbe Zerusareman kegap Zerikon veri. Ana verim, bigi kɨɨv gumgi shogi gumgi mbatɨgi, mbe zomzorgia kegap tuavar anan hegi. Mbe hegap, hor mbatɨgar ana muuŋgim, ana ŋama rimgim, mbe ana ndi tɨgap, ana shagi zorgiap, ana bigi kɨmgiap, wari regi.
